nodes.text: Cularin's disappearance occurred when the Darkstaff was activated. The entire Cularin system vanished from the galaxy, only to reemerge ten years later to a changed galaxy enthralled in the Clone Wars. The first person to return to Cularin was Devan For'deschel.
The event was colloquially known by some within the Cularin system as the Blink.
This event occurred to move the Living Force campaign forward ten years so that it coincided with the events of Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones.
